text: Kodela Siva Prasada Rao (2 May 1947 - 16 September 2019) was an Indian politician. He was born in Kandlagunta, Andhra Pradesh. Rao was a member of the Andhra Pradesh Legislative Assembly (APLA) from 1983 through his death. He was the Speaker of the APLA from 2014 until his death. On 16 September 2019, Rao died at a hospital in Hyderabad after hanging himself at the age of 72. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Suicides by hanging Category:Politicians who committed suicide Category:Politicians from Andhra Pradesh
title: Kodela Siva Prasada Rao
